name: movie-server
description: Home server for managing torrent-based downloads with web UI

scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm run dev -w @movie-server/api" "npm run dev -w @movie-server/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w @movie-server/shared && npm run build -w @movie-server/api && npm run build -w @movie-server/web
scripts.start: concurrently -n api,web "npm run start -w @movie-server/api" "npm run start -w @movie-server/web"
